botania.page.livingwoodTools0:
植物魔法全能工具模組可以將$(1)活木$(0)製成工具。
這些工具有與$(1)木質$(0)類似的特性，卻在可操作性，耐用性和一些調整方面有些優越。每當$(1)活木$(0)物品受到損壞時，如果物品欄中有$(4)魔力$(0)（例如$(4)魔力石板$(0)）可用，它將代替它。
除此之外，它們與原版工具一樣。
botania.page.livingrockTools0:
植物魔法全能工具模組可以將$(1)活石$(0)製成工具。
這些工具有與$(1)石製$(0)類似的特性，卻在可操作性，耐用性和一些調整方面有些優越。每當$(1)活石$(0)物品受到損壞時，如果物品欄中有$(4)魔力$(0)（例如$(4)魔力石板$(0)）可用，它將代替它。
除此之外，它們與原版工具一樣。
botania.page.manaGear11:
Because $(2)AIOT Botania$(0) is installed there are two more items. The $(1)Hoe$(0) is just like a normal vanilla Hoe but uses $(4)Mana$(0) like the other tools and can convert Farmland back to dirt.
The $(1)AIOT$(0) is like a fusion out of $(1)Manasteel Sword$(0), $(1)Pickaxe$(0), $(1)Axe$(0), $(1)Shovel$(0) and $(1)Hoe$(0) and combines all of their features.
botania.page.elfGear10: 最後，$(1)源質鋼劍$(0)會增加攻擊時 $(4)小精靈$(0)生成的機率（即使沒有 裝備$(1)源質鋼護甲$(0)也會生成）並 增強生成的$(4)小精靈$(0)。
botania.page.elfGear16: The $(1)Elementium Hoe$(0) tills a dirt block or something simular into a farmland block which doesn't break by jumping on it. With this farmland you don't need water nearby, the block is wet everytime. This farmland increases the growth speed of crops. When right-clicking on farmland the farmland converts back to grass.
botania.page.elfGear18:
Lastly, the $(1)Elementium AIOT$(0) fusions all the special effects of the other $(1)Elementium$(0) tools.
Because you can place $(4)saplings$(0) and $(4)torches$(0) with axe and pickaxe, there is a mode which can be toggled by $(4)shift-right clicking$(0). One mode is for tilling and create grass paths, the other mode is for placing saplings and torches.
